title: Sold. Thanks for all the interest.
author: Ladder7

posts.post_title: Sold. Thanks for all the interest.
posts.post_content:
I know nothing about this issue. Sooo, taking offers on the entire lot. Please don't scroo me to hard.

Evenly divided between pr-fr and vg-ex. Photo is representative of the entire grouping. I was given a big ol' box of loose cards and have nothing to slide them into. Will wrap em up carefully. Too lazy to piece meal thus I must sell this as a single lot -union worker here :)

(When I get some time, I'll have many more other types later this week.)

Ask questions! 
Steve
[url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]

These are guaranteed 100% money-back authentic. Trimmed or altered?.. Highly doubtful. Please don't make me break out the scanner! 

Everyone thusfar has wanted a few... Again, I'd be tickled pink, to sell as one lot.

If the person who got this nice lot from Steve is out there in cyberspace reading this, and would take a second to email me there is one card in your lot I would like to make an offer on. I can offer you the same card in return I'm just looking for an upgrade and will pay you well for the trade.

Cheers,

John
